singleProducts.Name: Apple.png
singleProducts.Description: Apples are a sweet fleshy fruit that grow around the world.

multipleProducts.Name: Apple.png
multipleProducts.Description: Apples are a sweet fleshy fruit that grow around the world.

multipleProducts.Name: Apricot.png
multipleProducts.Description: Sharing some resemblances to a peach, apricots are a small fleshy fruit that contain a hard stone (technically a seed) in the middle.

multipleProducts.Name: Avocado.png
multipleProducts.Description: Avocados are an interesting fruit because they are very low in carbohydrate yet high in healthy fats

multipleProducts.Name: Banana.png
multipleProducts.Description: The banana is a tropical fruit with a long body covered in a yellow skin.

multipleProducts.Name: Blackberries.png
multipleProducts.Description: They are a small edible fruit with a big taste, and botanically they are a kind of berry that grow on brambles.

multipleProducts.Name: Blackcurrant.png
multipleProducts.Description: Blackcurrants are a simple and common fruit found in Europe.
